text: Spurius Furius Medullinus Fusus was consul of the Roman republic in 481 BC.Livy, Ab urbe condita, 2.43 Furius was given command of an army to deal with the aggression of the Veientes. However, Livy says nothing notable occurred in the conflict during Furius' consulship.Livy, Ab urbe condita, 2.43 Furius held independent command (and therefor imperium) against the Aequi in 478 BC.Dionysius of Halicarnassus. ix. 16.4Broughton, vol i, pp.26 ==See also== *Furia (gens) == References == Category:5th-century BC Romans Category:Roman Republican consuls Medullinus Fusus, Spurius
title: Spurius Furius Medullinus Fusus (consul 481 BC)
